column1: Indicator
column22: Defintion

column1: Notices of Foreclosure Rate per 1,000 (1-4 family & condo properties)
column22: This indicator measures the total number of residential properties (single- and multi-family buildings and condominium apartment units) that had mortgage foreclosure actions (Lis Pendens) initiated against them.
